Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: WestBerlinerin
Reviews.Content: basement horrible reluctantly recently refurbished 4th floor facing overlooking mews quiet considering surroundings minute shower clean practical contrary reports customers 2 bedside lamps functioning bulbs unfortunately sockets plug leads neatly stored head rest day breakfast beeing hostel food ok continental addition fruit juices cheese drinkable coffee don´t expect staff english worse enjoy excellent location nice neighborhood situated 3 tube stations lots sights walking distance

Reviews.Title: “The worst experience ever!”
Reviews.Author: loulou98
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel admit impressed clean nights freezing cold style windows extremely draughty 1st night extra blankets told none available slept 3 layers clothes 2nd night freezing cold told avaible key safe housekeeping taking home iron arrival hotel told pay advance pay night advance receptionist agreed astonishing 2nd night stay 4am morning receptionist rang looking balance owed bring needless flabbergasted bizzare request told uncertain term reception 4am morning pay checking morning definately recommend hotel poor costumer service freezing cold noisy positive close proximity tube station

HotelInfo.Name: Avni Hotel At Courtfield
HotelInfo.Address: 74-76 Courtfield Gardens | corner of Courtfield and Collingham Gardens, London SW5 0NL, England
